folder: Herkimer Street & Buffalo Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
text:
Herkimer Street, east of Buffalo to Ralph Aves., showing in the center, the rectory and school, and to the left of them, the steeple of St. Benedict's Church. (R.C)

April 24, 1936.

P. L. Sperr.

folder: Buffalo Avenue & Herkimer Street., Brooklyn, NY
text:
Buffalo Avenue (right), at the N. W. corner of Herkimer Street, showing the coal yard of the Fulton Coal Company. Note the display of old carriages and carriage wheels.

July 13, 1940

P. L. Sperr

folder: Buffalo Avenue & Herkimer Street., Brooklyn, NY
